s0453.chinese: 簡王十三年，晉殺其君厲公，迎子周於周，立為悼公。
s0453.literal: King Jian's thirteenth year, Jin killed their lord Duke Li, welcomed Zi Zhou from Zhou, established him as Duke Dao.
s0453.idiomatic: King Jian's thirteenth year, Jin killed their lord Duke Li, welcomed Zi Zhou from Zhou, established him as Duke Dao.

s0454.chinese: 十四年，簡王崩，子靈王泄心立。
s0454.literal: Fourteenth year, King Jian died, his son King Ling Xie Xin ascended.
s0454.idiomatic: Fourteenth year, King Jian died, his son King Ling Xie Xin ascended.

s0455.chinese: 靈王二十四年，齊崔杼弒其君莊公。
s0455.literal: King Ling's twenty-fourth year, Qi's Cui Zhu assassinated their lord Duke Zhuang.
s0455.idiomatic: King Ling's twenty-fourth year, Qi's Cui Zhu assassinated their lord Duke Zhuang.

s0456.chinese: 二十七年，靈王崩，子景王貴立。
s0456.literal: Twenty-seventh year, King Ling died, his son King Jing Gui ascended.
s0456.idiomatic: Twenty-seventh year, King Ling died, his son King Jing Gui ascended.

s0457.chinese: 景王十八年，后太子聖而蚤卒。
s0457.literal: King Jing's eighteenth year, the queen's crown prince Sheng died young.
s0457.idiomatic: King Jing's eighteenth year, the queen's crown prince Sheng died young.

s0458.chinese: 二十年，景王愛子朝，欲立之，會崩，子丐之黨與爭立，國人立長子猛為王，子朝攻殺猛。
s0458.literal: Twentieth year, King Jing loved his son Zhao, wished to establish him, but died, Zi Kai's faction contended for the throne, the people of the capital established the eldest son Meng as king, Zi Zhao attacked and killed Meng.
s0458.idiomatic: Twentieth year, King Jing loved his son Zhao, wished to establish him, but died, Zi Kai's faction contended for the throne, the people of the capital established the eldest son Meng as king, Zi Zhao attacked and killed Meng.

s0460.chinese: 晉人攻子朝而立丐，是為敬王。
s0460.literal: The Jin people attacked Zi Zhao and established Kai, this was King Jing.
s0460.idiomatic: The Jin people attacked Zi Zhao and established Kai, this was King Jing.

s0461.chinese: 敬王元年，晉人入敬王，子朝自立，敬王不得入，居澤。
s0461.literal: King Jing's first year, the Jin people brought in King Jing, Zi Zhao established himself, King Jing could not enter, resided at Ze.
s0461.idiomatic: King Jing's first year, the Jin people brought in King Jing, Zi Zhao established himself, King Jing could not enter, resided at Ze.

s0462.chinese: 四年，晉率諸侯入敬王于周，子朝為臣，諸侯城周。
s0462.literal: Fourth year, Jin led the feudal lords to bring King Jing into Zhou, Zi Zhao became a subject, the feudal lords fortified Zhou.
s0462.idiomatic: Fourth year, Jin led the feudal lords to bring King Jing into Zhou, Zi Zhao became a subject, the feudal lords fortified Zhou.

s0463.chinese: 十六年，子朝之徒復作亂，敬王奔于晉。
s0463.literal: Sixteenth year, Zi Zhao's followers again rebelled, King Jing fled to Jin.
s0463.idiomatic: Sixteenth year, Zi Zhao's followers again rebelled, King Jing fled to Jin.

s0464.chinese: 十七年，晉定公遂入敬王于周。
s0464.literal: Seventeenth year, Duke Ding of Jin ultimately brought King Jing into Zhou.
s0464.idiomatic: Seventeenth year, Duke Ding of Jin ultimately brought King Jing into Zhou.

s0465.chinese: 三十九年，齊田常殺其君簡公。
s0465.literal: Thirty-ninth year, Qi's Tian Chang killed their lord Duke Jian.
s0465.idiomatic: Thirty-ninth year, Qi's Tian Chang killed their lord Duke Jian.

s0468.chinese: 四十二年，敬王崩，子元王仁立。
s0468.literal: Forty-second year, King Jing died, his son King Yuan Ren ascended.
s0468.idiomatic: Forty-second year, King Jing died, his son King Yuan Ren ascended.

s0469.chinese: 元王八年，崩，子定王介立。
s0469.literal: King Yuan's eighth year, he died, his son King Ding Jie ascended.
s0469.idiomatic: King Yuan's eighth year, he died, his son King Ding Jie ascended.

s0470.chinese: 定王十六年，三晉滅智伯，分有其地。
s0470.literal: King Ding's sixteenth year, the Three Jin extinguished Zhi Bo, divided and possessed his lands.
s0470.idiomatic: King Ding's sixteenth year, the Three Jin extinguished Zhi Bo, divided and possessed his lands.

s0471.chinese: 二十八年，定王崩，長子去疾立，是為哀王。
s0471.literal: Twenty-eighth year, King Ding died, his eldest son Qu Ji ascended, this was King Ai.
s0471.idiomatic: Twenty-eighth year, King Ding died, his eldest son Qu Ji ascended, this was King Ai.

s0472.chinese: 哀王立三月，弟叔襲殺哀王而自立，是為思王。
s0472.literal: King Ai ascended for three months, his younger brother Shu attacked and killed King Ai and established himself, this was King Si.
s0472.idiomatic: King Ai ascended for three months, his younger brother Shu attacked and killed King Ai and established himself, this was King Si.
